# webc-if



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                                                                                                                              | Type  | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----- | ----------- |
| `condition` | `condition`  | The condition that will be evaluated in order to check which slots will be visible                                                                                       | `any` | `undefined` |
| `model`     | `data-model` | An optional model that will be used to check the condition; if not provided, then the component will find the closes webc-bindable element and take the model from there | `any` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event                              | Description | Type               |
| ---------------------------------- | ----------- | ------------------ |
| `webcardinal:model:get`            |             | `CustomEvent<any>` |
| `webcardinal:translationModel:get` |             | `CustomEvent<any>` |
